strong.font: BETHALTO SCHOOL DISTRICT CONTINUES TO FIND WAYS TO TELL OUR STORY!

font.font: In the spirit of continuous improvement, BCUSD#8 maintains transparent, open communication about the performance of its schools. The state of Illinois has changed the way it reports out on schools across the state and we are working to keep our stakeholders informed of Our Story. Please take the time to review our

You will find information about our district that ranges from student demographics and success to information about our budget.
We encourage all our parents and guardians to visit our
